expo.name: GreenToGo
expo.description: GreenToGo is a service that makes returnable and reusable takeout containers a reality! Our goal is to help the community reduce waste by making reusable takeout containers a convenient part of the Durham infrastructure.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location is used in the map view screen to allow you to see where you are in relation to locations that use the GreenToGo service
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Your location is used in the map view screen to allow you to see where you are in relation to locations that use the GreenToGo service
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The camera is used to capture relevant QR codes that our service uses to check in and check out containers
